sneakers.name: Off-White x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'UNC'
sneakers.image_url: https://trevknows.github.io/Project-Ifrit/images/OFF-WHITE X AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG 'UNC'.jpg
sneakers.description: The Off-White x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'UNC' is a highly coveted collaboration between Off-White and Jordan Brand. Featuring Virgil Abloh's signature deconstructed design elements, these sneakers combine a classic UNC-inspired color scheme with unique Off-White branding.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Royal Toe'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Royal Toe' features a timeless colorway that combines black, white, and royal blue. These sneakers offer a classic and versatile look with premium materials and the iconic Air Jordan 1 silhouette.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 High 'Chicago' 1985
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 High 'Chicago' 1985 pays homage to the original 1985 release of the Air Jordan 1. With its iconic red, white, and black color scheme, these sneakers offer a nostalgic and classic look with a touch of basketball history.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Obsidian'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Obsidian' showcases a rich combination of navy blue, white, and university blue. These sneakers offer a clean and sophisticated look with premium materials and the iconic Air Jordan 1 design.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Hyper Royal'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Hyper Royal' features a refreshing color combination of hyper royal, sail, and white. These sneakers offer a vibrant and stylish look with premium materials and classic Air Jordan 1 design.

sneakers.name: WMNS Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Reverse Laney'
sneakers.image_url: https://trevknows.github.io/Project-Ifrit/images/WMNS AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG 'REVERSE LANEY'.jpg
sneakers.description: The WMNS Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Reverse Laney' offers a unique twist to the Laney High School color scheme. These sneakers feature a vibrant combination of varsity maize, game royal, and white, offering a bold and stylish look for women.

sneakers.name: WMNS Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Stealth'
sneakers.description: The WMNS Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Stealth' offers a versatile and stylish option for women. These sneakers feature a combination of black, white, and stealth gray, providing a sleek and modern look.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Dark Marina Blue'
sneakers.image_url: https://trevknows.github.io/Project-Ifrit/images/AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG 'DARK MARINA BLUE'.jpg
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Dark Marina Blue' showcases a rich and vibrant color scheme. These sneakers feature a combination of dark marina blue, black, and white, offering a bold and eye-catching look.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Court Purple 2.0'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Court Purple 2.0' offers a fresh take on the classic color blocking. These sneakers feature a combination of court purple, white, and black, providing a clean and vibrant look.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Alternate Bred'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Alternate Bred' offers a stylish and versatile option for everyday wear. These sneakers feature a combination of black, gym red, and white, providing a classic and timeless look.

sneakers.name: Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Perforated - White University Gold'
sneakers.description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid 'Perforated - White University Gold' combines classic design with modern details. These sneakers feature a combination of white, university gold, and black, offering a clean and sophisticated look.
